channel.title: The Ppl In My Server Start out with phats?!
channel.description: How do i make it so they dont start out with phats?

item.title: The Ppl In My Server Start out with phats?!
item.dc:creator: @pimpownage pimpownage
item.description:
@pimpownage wrote:

player.java search for //Giving the player a unique look then under it will have sumthin like this

   [code]playerEquipment[playerHat]=10721;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=10720;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=4712;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=10232;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4714;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=3057;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;
             [/code]

that’s mine, which is str skillcape and hood ahrims fury desert boots and d scim… uc an use it if u like but meh, if you want to change it just look for the item id’s then add them before the ; (where the numbers r atm)

Read full topic
item.source: The Ppl In My Server Start out with phats?!
